author: Madeline Stone
title: From hand sanitizer and toilet paper to yeast and hair clippers: Here's how Americans' spending habits have changed after weeks staying at home
description: Americans' shopping patterns have evolved over the past weeks while staying at home during the coronavirus outbreak. Nielsen data stretching back to the beginning of March reveals how their priorities have shifted. While hand sanitizer and toilet paper were a…
content:
Americans' spending habits have evolved as the coronavirus outbreak continues and most of the US gets accustomed to life under stay-at-home orders. 
Hand sanitizer, soaps, and aerosol disinfectants were among the first products to see spikes in sales when th… [+885 chars]
